resources.string: Welcome to the Marine Corps Quiz App!
This app will test you on your knowledge about the Marine Corps.
Who were the only two Marines to ever receive the Medal of Honor twice?
Where was the birthplace of the Marine Corps?
What date was the Marine Corps established (aka, its birthday)?
Which of the following islands did the Marines fight the Japanese on in WWII?
What was the nickname given to General Lewis B. Puller?
Correct, Smedley Butler and Daniel Daly were the only two Marines to ever receive the Medal of Honor.
Correct, Tun Tavern was the birthplace of the Marine Corps.
Correct, 11/10/1775 was the birthdate of the Marine Corps.
Correct, the Marines fought the Japanese on the islands of Tarawa, Iwo Jima, and the Solomon Islands during WWII.
Correct, the nickname for General Lewis B. Puller was Chesty.
Incorrect, you need to study more.

, you must be out of your @#$%^\*() mind!
